extendedInfo.description: Suppose, you have an image of size 72x48 which you want to use for 'mdpi' type screen of Android devices. But now you need to figure out what should be the sizes of other 2 screen types, namely 'hdpi' and 'ldpi'. Here are the steps.1. Enter the size 72x48 of image in the boxes provided below.2. Select the screen type 'mdpi' in the drop-down listThats it. you get the size of other 2 screen types.
